name: Space Adventure (itch) (Jozenkow)
description:
This is a simple space shooter game

You need to destroy the space invaders and save the galaxy from giant mothership.

In the game you need to face waves of enemy ships. After each level you will visit a shop where you can upgrade your ship.

The game is filled with ambient space soundtrack and gentle sound effects.

This is perfect game for someone who likes nice, gentle gameplay.

Credits:

Almost 99% of graphics wheren't made by me. They are mostly from opengameart.org and itch.io free game assets.

Programming: me
